thread.title: Carol Crunkhorn
thread.title_full: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Carol Crunkhorn

author: Carol Crunkhorn
title: Carol Crunkhorn
text: I had no problem booking through Cruise Sale Finder online and when I needed to clarify something by 'phone, the representative was friendly and efficient. Based on my experience, I would recommend Cruise Sale Finder to anyone wanting quick, easy, efficient and friendly service.
